description: A soft quilted interior lining offers ultimate protection and flexibility for 17" AppleMacBooks and other PCs up to 16".  Includes magnetic Fidlock snap buckles for automatic closure and two finger opening.  Water resistant ripstop fabric adds protection and durability.   Custom molded polygon waffle design back padding for sleek look, extra durability and ultimate comfort.  Reflective webbing for additional safety at night.  Soft fabric lines interior iPad pocket.
title: Altego Polygon Sunfire 17" Laptop Backpack for Apple MacBook + iPad Pocket (36302)
